name: Marinated Pesto Rosso Salad
author: CHERYLPTW
summary: A delicious vegetarian salad perfect for everyone! Top with shaved Parmigiano-Reggiano before serving.
ingredients: 1 ½ cups thinly sliced roasted red peppers
1 cup thinly sliced yellow summer squash
½ cup chopped Italian flat-leaf parsley
2 cups sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, drained and oil reserved
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes
Bring a pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add asparagus tips and cook uncovered until bright green, about 3 minutes
Drain in a colander and immediately immerse in ice water for several minutes to stop the cooking process
Mix pasta, asparagus tips, roasted red peppers, onion, tomatoes, zucchini, yellow squash, cauliflower, fennel, and parsley in a large bowl
Combine sun-dried tomatoes, basil leaves, Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, mascarpone cheese, roasted garlic, salt, and pepper in a food processor
Process together and slowly add reserved sun-dried tomato oil and olive oil
